text: Mopanveldophis is a genus of snake in the family Colubridae that contains the sole species Mopanveldophis zebrinus. It is found in northern Namibia. == References == Category:Colubrids Category:Monotypic snake genera Category:Reptiles described in 2000 Category:Snakes of Africa Category:Reptiles of Namibia Category:Endemic fauna of Namibia
title: Mopanveldophis
